Class ReviewCRUDTestingAutomation

java.lang.Object
tests.ReviewCRUDTestingAutomation
public class ReviewCRUDTestingAutomation extends Object

Test of the review CRUD methods.

A test of the review CRUD methods including creating, reading, updating and deleting reviews to/from the review SQL table. The test will use preloaded content to generate reviews in order to perform some of these functions.

Version:
0.00 2025-04-01 - Initial baseline
Author:
Kyle Pierce

Zachary Chalmers

Chris Espinal

Darren Fernandes

Dara Gafoor

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp() throws SQLException
      Connects to the databaseHelper to initialize the testing environment.
      Throws:
      SQLException - In case the database throws an error

    • testReviewDatabaseSize

      public void testReviewDatabaseSize()
      Test 26 - This method performs test 1 which will simply test the database size to ensure the expected number of reviews exists in the database to ensure that all reviews are accessible and able to be searched.

    • testDeleteReview

      public void testDeleteReview()
      Test 27 - This method performs test 2 which will test the delete function. It will delete review id #2 and then search for it.

    • testUpdateReview

      public void testUpdateReview()
      Test 28 - This method performs test 3 which will test the update function. This will update the text and then check to see if that text is reflected in the review database.

    • testSearchForExistingReview1

      public void testSearchForExistingReview1()
      Test 29 - This method simply pulling another review from the database

    • testSearchForExistingReview2

      public void testSearchForExistingReview2()
      Test 30 - This method simply pulling another review from the database
